devdoc.details: This contract is to be used as a diamond facet (see ERC2535 Diamond Standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2535).Note: This facet depends on {ProxyAdminFacet}, {ContractOwnershipFacet} and {InterfaceDetectionFacet}.

initERC721MetadataStorage(string,string).details: Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.Reverts if the proxy initialization phase for ERC721ContractMetadataStorage is set to `1` or above.

setBaseMetadataURI(string).details: Reverts if the sender is not the contract owner.Emits a {BaseMetadataURISet} event.

returns.uri: The metadata URI for the token identifier.

devdoc.title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional extension: Metadata (facet version).

BaseMetadataURISet(string).notice: Emitted when the base token metadata URI is updated.

initERC721MetadataStorage(string,string).notice: Initializes the storage with a name and a symbol.Sets the proxy initialization phase for ERC721ContractMetadataStorage to `1`.Marks the following ERC165 interface(s) as supported: ERC721Metadata.

name().notice: Gets the name of the token. E.g. "My Token".

symbol().notice: Gets the symbol of the token. E.g. "TOK".

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Gets the metadata URI for a token identifier.
